summary: A collection of database migration scripts that transition the backend from version 0.7.0 to 0.8.0. They modify the schema, rename and restructure fields, convert legacy evaluation and scenario documents to the new formats, add default evaluator configurations, aggregate evaluation results, and replace ODMantic reference fields with Beanie Link objects, while also handling image metadata for variant assets.
business_intent: Enable a smooth upgrade of the applicationâ€™s data layer to the new version, preserving existing data, introducing new evaluation capabilities, and aligning the data model with the updated ORM framework.
